definition: to pass on to/to transfer to/to hand on to/to pass to (in football etc)
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)

sentences.english: When the terminal has an alarm, the terminal will automatically transmit the location information to the management center.
sentences.chinese: 終端出現警情時，終端自動將位置信息傳給管理中心。

sentences.english: The carpenter working on the rafter passed his axe down to his mate below.
sentences.chinese: 在椽子上幹活的木匠將斧子傳給下面的夥伴。

sentences.english: During the teaching force of the subtleties will be passed to students, respected by the disciples.
sentences.chinese: 教學期間將武之奧妙之處傳給師生，受到弟子尊敬。

sentences.english: I think I must have passed it to Jiro .
sentences.chinese: 我想一定是我傳給了大東。

sentences.english: Even still passed the little villa to the achievement method to the peach blossom.
sentences.chinese: 向桃花甚至還把功法傳給了小築。

sentences.english: There is the waiter who takes the order and conveys it to the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 比如記錄點菜並將記錄單傳給廚房的服務員。

sentences.english: Pass a current through an inductor, and you create a magnetic flux.
sentences.chinese: 把電流傳給電感器，就會產生磁通量。

sentences.english: The millionaire's property descended to his eldest son.
sentences.chinese: 那個百萬富翁的財產傳給了他的長子。

sentences.english: The angel told the evangelist's evangel to a gang of fanged gangling gangsters.
sentences.chinese: 天使把福音傳道者的佳音傳給一夥有毒牙的瘦長匪徒。

sentences.english: This is excellent information that she can pass on to her partner!
sentences.chinese: 她可以把這條重要的信息傳給她的伴侶。

sentences.english: He played a good-length ball back to the bowler.
sentences.chinese: 他傳給投手一個落點好球。

sentences.english: The ball Giggsy crossed for Ronaldo was a classic.
sentences.chinese: 吉格斯傳給克里斯迪亞諾的球堪稱經典。

sentences.english: The team was burned out and we decided that it was time to find someone else to carry the torch.
sentences.chinese: 整個團隊已身心俱疲，我們覺得該把火炬傳給旁人了。

sentences.english: Do NOT be afraid to make a pass back to your defenders or GK if options in front are limited.
sentences.chinese: 前方沒有機會時，不要忌諱回傳給後衛或守門員。

sentences.english: How would you relay advice to new clubs?
sentences.chinese: 你如何將忠告轉傳給新社？

sentences.english: and would pass it to his children as his chiefest treasure.
sentences.chinese: 會作爲最珍貴的寶貝傳給兒女。
